verses.verse: He cried <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> also in mine ears <S%H241><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Cause them that have charge <S%H6486><s%> over the city <S%H5892><s%> to draw near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, even every man <S%H376><s%> with his destroying <S%H4892><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

And, behold, six <S%H8337><s%> men <S%H582><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> of the higher <S%H5945><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%>, which lieth <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8716><s%> toward the north <S%H6828><s%>, and every man <S%H376><s%> a slaughter <S%H4660><s%> weapon <S%H3627><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>; and one <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> them was clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with linen <S%H906><s%>, with a writer's <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%> inkshofar <S%H7083><s%> by his side <S%H4975><s%>: and they went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> the brasen <S%H5178><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%>.

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> was gone up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from the cherub <S%H3742><s%>, whereupon he was, to the threshold <S%H4670><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%>. And he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with linen <S%H906><s%>, which had the writer's <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8802><s%> inkshofar <S%H7083><s%> by his side <S%H4975><s%>;

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Go through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, through the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and set <S%H8427><s%> <S%H8689><s%> a mark <S%H8420><s%> upon the foreheads <S%H4696><s%> of the men <S%H582><s%> that sigh <S%H584><s%> <S%H8737><s%> and that cry <S%H602><s%> <S%H8737><s%> for all the abominations <S%H8441><s%> that be done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

And to the others <S%H428><s%> he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine hearing <S%H241><s%>, Go <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8798><s%> ye after <S%H310><s%> him through the city <S%H5892><s%>, and smite <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8685><s%>: let not your eye <S%H5869><s%> spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither have ye pity <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8799><s%>:

Slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> utterly <S%H4889><s%> old <S%H2205><s%> and young <S%H970><s%>, both maids <S%H1330><s%>, and little children <S%H2945><s%>, and women <S%H802><s%>: but come not near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any man <S%H376><s%> upon whom is the mark <S%H8420><s%>; and begin <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8686><s%> at my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>. Then they began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8686><s%> at the ancient <S%H2205><s%> men <S%H582><s%> which were before <S%H6440><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%>, and fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the courts <S%H2691><s%> with the slain <S%H2491><s%>: go ye forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8798><s%>. And they went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and slew <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And it came to pass, while they were slaying <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8687><s%> them, and I was left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8737><s%>, that I fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon my face <S%H6440><s%>, and cried <S%H2199><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Ah <S%H162><s%> YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> ! wilt thou destroy <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8688><s%> all the residue <S%H7611><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> in thy pouring out <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of thy fury <S%H2534><s%> upon Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> ?

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he unto me, The iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> and Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> is exceeding <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1419><s%>, and the land <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of blood <S%H1818><s%>, and the city <S%H5892><s%> full <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of perverseness <S%H4297><s%>: for they say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, The YY <S%H3068><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the YY <S%H3068><s%> seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%> not.

And as for me also, mine eye <S%H5869><s%> shall not spare <S%H2347><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, neither will I have pity <S%H2550><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, but I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> upon their head <S%H7218><s%>.

And, behold, the man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with linen <S%H906><s%>, which had the inkshofar <S%H7083><s%> by his side <S%H4975><s%>, reported <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8688><s%> the matter <S%H1697><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, I have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> as thou hast commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.
